name: sequelize-admin
description: A connect module for managing database entries of registered sequelize models.

scripts.update-bootstrap: mkdir tmp && cd tmp && git clone git://github.com/twitter/bootstrap.git && cd bootstrap && git co v`node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version)"` && cd ../../ && node_modules/.bin/bootstrap-amd tmp/bootstrap && rm -rf app/js/vendor/bootstrap/* && cp -rf tmp/bootstrap/amd/* app/js/vendor/bootstrap && rm -rf tmp
